mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IF_DTD_001_T( ESB_SEQ , ESB_STATUS_CD , ESB_TRANSACTION_ID , ESB_RECV_DT , ESB_INTERFACE_ID , FIRST_NAME , LAST_NAME , EMAIL , PHONE , CUSTOMER_ID) values (SEQ_IF_DTD_001_T.NEXTVAL, 'N', #{transactionId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiverMsgRecvDt ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FIRST_NAME ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LAST_NAME ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EMAIL ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{PHONE ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CUSTOMER_ID ,jdbcType=INTEGER})
